biz.sudden.baseAndUtility.web.controller.impl
Class UserManager

java.lang.Object
  biz.sudden.baseAndUtility.web.controller.impl.UserManager

public class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object

This application scoped User Manager tracks all currently logged in users and requests a render on every login/logout event. The various controllers are able to become this Manager injected (with the aid of Spring) and then are able to retrieve a list of currently logged in users.

Author:
thomasfeiner

getUserList

public java.util.List<javax.faces.model.SelectItem> getUserList(java.lang.String withoutThisUser)
Parameters:
withoutThisUser - The currently logged in user should not be shown in a "logged in users"-list, so this user can be excluded through this parameter
Returns:
a list with all users (each item has icefaces type "SelectItem")
